Description:
SOLD by Gavin Coyne 0417 309 650
A statement in luxury and style, this stunning quality 1 year old Metricon Merricks 37 on a large 512sqm block is situated in the Highgrove Estate and delivers flawless standards of premium living options.
Offering everyday comfort and a touch of class at every turn, this appealing family home offers an opportunity to step up and secure the next level of luxury. Inside and out, it has been beautifully finished and is impeccably presented, providing a loveable and comfortable space the whole family will enjoy and appreciate.
All four bedrooms are upstairs including the master bedroom with full ensuite and walk-in robe and the other three bedrooms have built-in robes and are serviced by the main bathroom. There is also a children's retreat upstairs so they can enjoy their own space to watch T.V or play video games.
Downstairs the kitchen, meals and family area at the rear of the home is light filled and alluring, offering a gourmet kitchen with butler's pantry, stone benchtops, soft close cupboards and quality appliances, a spacious meals area with garden views and a laid back family room overlooking the alfresco. The formal lounge at the front could also be used as a 5th bedroom if required and there is also a full bathroom and study downstairs.
The standard of living in this home is taken up to the next level with inclusions such as ducted heating, evaporative cooling, two split system air conditioners, remote double garage with internal access, timber laminate floors, double glaze windows throughout, high ceilings, alarm system, dishwasher and more.
Outside, both front and back gardens are beautifully landscaped and designed to be low maintenance. A large alfresco is perfect for hosting a BBQ for family and friends while the kids enjoy playing in the backyard. It's possible to fit such a large family home and all of these outdoor extras thanks to a large 512sqm2 block which is hard to find these days.
Walking distance to communal use of tennis courts and stunning parkland, it's hard to beat a location as ideal as this. Call today, and make the first step towards a luxury lifestyle.

Own this stunning multi award winning luxury display home! Ready to move in now!
Here's your chance to secure this stunning award-winning display home by custom builders Leneeva Homes.
